script.title: Good work!
script.body: Our algorithm is adjusting its recommendations based on your interactions. Don't forget to use the like, share, and bookmark buttons to give the algorithm a signal of what to prioritize.

script.body:
There can be a mismatch between the signals the algorithm picks up on and what we think they mean.

We want to try something new and share the data we have on our users' preferences which go into these profiles. Click continue to see yours:
This is based on your interactions that signal to us your engagement with different types of content, here's how we've been weighing them:

We think we should start letting people change these numbers. You can try dragging the bars above to change what the algorithm values more.

On the upciming screens, we try to be more transparent and let you click the menu on the bottom to see the data we collect on you in real time.

script.title: New Feature
script.body:
We hope that providing some transparency on how we're interpreting your interactions and what data we collected can help you engage with our app with greater control.

We're experimenting with a new feature where you can select from a number of algorithms to use in our app.

Here's a sneak peak of some examples of what these algorithms can look like.
